content.rendered:
Thank you. You’ve just done something wonderful to help give children a loving family, worth celebrating.

We’ll be in touch shortly to help you make your day a great success.

Back to Homepage

.

excerpt.rendered: Thank you for pledging your special day. You’ve just done something wonderful to help give children a loving family, worth celebrating.
